mapper.select: SELECT A.REQUEST_ID , A.SALESMAN_ID , B.SALESMAN_NM , B.PHOTO , B.STAR_POINT , B.COMP_POINT , A.SALESMAN_BENEFIT , A.STAR_POINT , C.VENDOR_NM , B.LOCATION , B.MOBILE , A.STATUS , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM CODES WHERE CODE_GROUP='1002' AND CODE_CD = A.STATUS) STATUS_NM , A.CREATE_DATE , A.UPDATE_DATE FROM ESTIMATE_CONTRACT A , SALESMAN B , VENDOR C WHERE A.REQUEST_ID = #{reqId} AND A.SALESMAN_ID = B.SALESMAN_ID AND A.SALESMAN_ID = IFNULL(#{salesman_id}, A.SALESMAN_ID) AND B.VENDOR_ID = C.VENDOR_ID

SELECT REQUEST_ID , SALESMAN_ID , MESSAGE , USE_YN , CREATE_USER_ID , CREATE_USER_NM , CREATE_DATE FROM ESTIMATE_REPLY WHERE REQUEST_ID = #{request_id} AND SALESMAN_ID = #{salesman_id} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE ASC
